price: Ва ҷуз ситамкорони гунаҳкор [касе] он [рӯз]-ро такзиб намекунад
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
